text: The Mayfield classification is a system of categorizing perilunate dislocations. ==Classification== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Stage ! Description |- | I | Scapholunate dissociation |- | II | Lunocapitate disruption |- | III | Lunotriquetral disruption |- | IV | Lunate dislocation |} ==References== ==External links== Category:Orthopedic classifications Category:Injuries of wrist and hand
title: Mayfield classification
